TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Define um método para adicionar a parte da XPS (XML Paper Specification) para um pacote XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações sobre o `DocumentStructure` elemento de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] do pacote, consulte o capítulo 9 o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, a qual você pode obter em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: Adiciona a parte do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] para um pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

returns.span: Um , que representa a parte de um pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações sobre o `DocumentStructure` elemento de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] do pacote, consulte o capítulo 9 a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] especificação, que pode ser obtido em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
